Reviews.Title: KEVKEV!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin stokes
Reviews.Content: 4 stars for just the sound-speckers on the phone there great compared to the newer phones around. . Thats about it

Reviews.Title: Good phone if you need a smart phone with push to talk feature
Reviews.Author: Antonieta B.
Reviews.Content: I received it by date promised and as was described. Upgraded from a Motorola Admiral and made a difference. It works great, don't be deceived by the rugged look of the phone like I was. It seems as it comes with a cover so it isn't as bulky as it looks.

Reviews.Title: Kyocera Torque (Sprint) Smart Rugged Phone, Water, Dust, and Drop Proof
Reviews.Author: BH
Reviews.Content: 8-9 of us at work have these units for our work smart-phones / direct connects. They work adequately and we would probably like them better if the SPRINT signal was better in Phoenix, AZ. They stand up to most of our abuse and we have only had to replace them from theft or a broken screen except for one that had an internal problem that was taken care of by warranty service.

Reviews.Title: Upsetting!! Cell phone did not include SIM Card
Reviews.Author: Hilda
Reviews.Content: After spending hours on with customer service and at the sprint store we were finally able to set up the phone! Would have been a lot easier if we had the SIM Card to begin with. Definitely disappointed!!!

Reviews.Title: amazing phone
Reviews.Author: kyle
Reviews.Content: love this phone i bought to i tested the limits of the other one lol just wish i coulda saved 70 bucks last time
